focus on safety

Ansell Guardian® is our proprietary service to help companies select the right personal protective equipment solution to improve their safety, productivity and cost performance

A customised alignment

Depending on individual business objectives, one or more of the following solutions will be deployed.

An integrated solution

Ansell Guardian® partners with industrial and medical organisations to address the challanges in today's PPE environment and deliver measurable safety and business improvements.

Safety/compliance

  • Personalised risk management solutions
  • Data-driven recommendations
  • Increased safety awareness and worker motivation
  • Regulatory compliance

Increased safety and compliance

Safety/compliance

  • Best practice recommendations to optimise PPE dispensing
  • Improved output
  • Reduced waste
  • Solutions for reuse, recycling & disposal
  • Simplified accessibility and inventory

Improved productivity

Safety/compliance

  • Business performance improvement/implementation across 7 cost drivers that measure financial progress
  • Reduced costs of injuries
  • Lower procurement and transaction costs
  • SKU reduction and standardisation

Cost optimisation
